title: POWERGRID Has Successfully Commissioned The Project 1d - POWERGRID commissioned Gujarat transmission expansion project effective 3-Apr-2025, notified 5-Jun-2025.
date: 1d - POWERGRID commissioned Gujarat transmission expansion project effective 3-Apr-2025, notified 5-Jun-2025.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition 1d - Power Grid acquires MEL Power Transmission for Rs. 8.53 Cr under TBCB, expanding transmission network.
date: 1d - Power Grid acquires MEL Power Transmission for Rs. 8.53 Cr under TBCB, expanding transmission network.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management 31 May - Two Executive Directors ceased due to superannuation on 31.05.2025 at POWERGRID.
date: 31 May - Two Executive Directors ceased due to superannuation on 31.05.2025 at POWERGRID.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements), Regulations 2015. 31 May - POWERGRID fined Rs. 14.4 lakh for board composition non-compliance; independent directors appointed subsequently.
date: 31 May - POWERGRID fined Rs. 14.4 lakh for board composition non-compliance; independent directors appointed subsequently.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript 28 May - Transcript of Webinar held on 21st May, 2025.
date: 28 May - Transcript of Webinar held on 21st May, 2025.
